Name: Cry Wolf (band)
rawData: Cry Wolf is a hair metal band formed in the San Francisco Bay Area in the mid-1980s. Originally named Heroes, the original band consisted of Tim Hall (vocals), Steve McKnight (guitar), Phil Deckard (bass), John Freixas (drums) and JC Crampton (Keyboards).
This article on a United States metal band is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.

Origin: San Francisco Bay Area, United States
